__e: Adam would be given immunity for any crimes he may have been compelled to commit by the individual who took him, and in exchange he'd tell you everything he knows about the man.
I'll tell you where the bomb is in exchange for immunity, for the murder of Jack Bauer.

But first, I need a guarantee in writing that Dr. Ward will receive both protective custody and legal immunity before he says a word. I'm sure you're aware the DA doesn't give out immunity to anybody who tells a good story.
Well, we've assured them that in exchange for immunity and, uh, $10.8 million, that you'll cooperate with the investigation, and that, if your memory does recover...
Basically, you have absolute impunity to do whatever you want... Nobody can touch you.
- For what? We'll find out when he gets immunity and 500,000 grand.
